title: Rockstar ISA to call Brides to Book Bridal Gown Appointments
job_overview:
About the ISA Role
As a FEMALE  ISA , you'll spend your workday speaking directly with brides-to-be who’ve shown interest in visiting our partner bridal boutiques. Your mission? Build rapport, answer questions, qualify their needs, and secure appointments for their bridal gown fittings.

You'll be the friendly, reassuring voice guiding them through this important part of their wedding planning journey—making them feel valued, heard, and cared for.

What You'll Do
Make outbound calls to brides who submitted inquiries online

Build genuine, warm connections in every conversation

Qualify leads by understanding their needs, style, budget, and timeline

Guide brides through the booking process and schedule their appointments

Accurately update lead details and appointment info in our CRM

Maintain daily call reporting and attend training sessions as needed

Who We're Looking For
Excellent spoken and written English

Confident, friendly phone presence with outstanding soft skills

Experience making calls to online leads (preferred)

Familiarity with CRM systems (Go High Level is a plus)

Patience, empathy, and the ability to keep conversations positive and relaxed

Technical Requirements
Stable internet connection (minimum 20 Mbps upload/download)

Quality microphone and headset

Minimum 8GB RAM computer

Perks of the Role
Paid, comprehensive training

Stable, long-term opportunity

Supportive, friendly team environment

Work from home

What to Expect
Comprehensive paid training: 8 hours/day for two weeks

Start at 5 hours/day for the first 4 weeks post-training

Grow to 8 hours/day in a stable, long-term role with room to develop

Work aligned to US time zones (Eastern or Pacific Time)

Some Saturday availability required (not every Saturday)

How to Apply
Include a voice recording or short video introduction with your application (this is required)

To confirm you read the full post, please include the number 67 in your message
